game_description: Destroy all the meteorites before they destroy you! You need good peripheral vision and perfect aim to succeed in this game. It’s easy to play but hard to master. Meteoric VR is a retro low poly first-person space shooter where mission is to protect the planet from incoming meteors. Try not to run out of lives! Our signature feature is a unique movement that you have to make with your hands to achieve successful shooting. Features: - 180 degrees gameplay - Zero motion sickness - Easy to play - Aim assist - Multiple power ups - Fitness element - Adaptive music - LIV and MRC support - Scoring system We created Discord as the main platform to interact with the community and beta testers. We share sneak peeks, hottest news, behind the scenes content, and answer questions on a daily basis. If you are interested in the game or want to help us out by giving constructive feedback, please feel free to join the server. Join the Meteoric VR Galaxy → https://discord.gg/VjgDjR5rkD Check out the Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1816770/Meteoric_VR/ Meteoric VR - Early Access on Applab: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4128981423869367/
review_1: This is incredibly entertaining; we can't wait for additional levels to be added. It's also a wonderful workout that will undoubtedly tone your arms.
review_2: after trying the demo I bought the game, and it's really beautiful!
review_3: This is a great game with lots of potential. I really enjoyed mission 1, but then I kept failing mission 2, to the point that it frustrated me. The difference in difficulty level between mission 1 and 2 is pretty big. Missing just ONE asteroid leads to the game ending and then you start from the beginning. This is unnecessarily frustrating. The devs really must add a "no fail" mode and simply allow users to see their score at the end, with the goal of improving it over time.
